title.narrative: BBB Bangladesh : Building Back Better in times of Covid-19 Bangladesh

description.narrative: The Covid-19 pandemic has exacerbated the already complex web of vulnerabilities of children who are victims of, or at risk of SEC  and poses unprecedented threats to their protection. The projectÃ…â€º goal is to make sure children and youth are better protected when at risk or victim of sexual exploitation, during and in the aftermath of the Covid-19 pandemic. This will be achieved through the projects 5 outcomes. This project is under the programme DtZ Building Back Better in times of Covid-19 that will build on the 2016-2020 DtZ and complement the 2020-2021 Voice for Change.
Expenditure 2021

title.narrative: Actors in the Child Protection System are strengthened in multi-stakeholder settings to prevent and advocate for SEC, in the context of Covid-19

description.narrative: # of boy/girl victims rescued from SEC

comment.narrative: 1 event planned in Q1 2022 done in Q4 2021. That's why expenditure is lower than planned.;
4 children are rescued in Q4 which is more than planned. So expenditure exceeds target;

There was lockdown due to COVID until 11th August, partners agreement was signed in July and funds received on 14 August. Partners had one and half months to implement the project. which caused low achievement.;

comment.narrative: Legal supports planned in previous quarters are provided in current quarter, Besides, some events of Q4 are organised in Q1. So expenditure is higher;

There was lockdown due to COVID until 11th August, partners agreement was signed in July and funds received on 14 August. Partners had one and half months to implement the project. which caused low achievement. Program support cost (staff cost and office management) cost are proportionately distributed over to those outputs performed. That is why output cost is higher than actual.;

comment.narrative: Some events performed in Q3 are charged in Q4. More over, 2 national big events planned in 2022 are done in Q4 2021. Moreover partail payment of baseline was partially paid in 4th qtr which was planned in qtr 3 . Therefore budget burning is higher than target.;

There was lockdown due to COVID until 11th August, partners agreement was signed in July and funds received on 14 August. Partners had one and half months to implement the project. which caused low achievement. Program support cost are proportionately distributed over to those outputs performed. That is why output cost is higher than actual.;
some events planned in Q3 and Q4 2021, done and charged. So expenditure is high;

comment.narrative: 2 events not done in Q3 2021 and 1 event planned in Q1 2022 are accomplished. So target exceeds than planned.;

Activity 3.2.1.a planned in Q4 2021, done in this quarter. It costs Euro 1059. Besides, activity 3.2.1.e planned in Q3 2021 performed in this quarter. In addition, activity 3.2.1.f performed 5 against 2. So expenditure is much higher than planned.;

There was lockdown due to COVID until 11th August, partners agreement was signed in July and funds received on 14 August. Partners had one and half months to implement the project. which caused low achievement.;

comment.narrative: Foreseeing prevalence of COVID 19, out partners prioritised accomplishing community level activities, so achievements are so high. Some more activities such as district level consultation, human chain, press conference are accomplished than planned, so expenditure exceeds than planned.;

There was lockdown due to COVID until 11th August, partners agreement was signed in July and funds received on 14 August. Partners had one and half months to implement the project. which caused low achievement.;

comment.narrative: Due to late in conducting SEC research, 2 events could not be accomplished. So program target is low. Some events planned in previous quarter are charged in this quarter. So expenditure is higher than planned;
Given the COVID situation, emphasis was given to accomplish activities at community level. Therefore, these activities could not be done. As a result there was less expenses.;

There was lockdown due to COVID until 11th August, partners agreement was signed in July and funds received on 14 August. Partners had one and half months to implement the project. which caused low achievement. Program support cost are proportionately distributed over to those outputs performed. That is why output cost is higher than actual.;

comment.narrative: 2 events of Q3 and 1 event of Q2 under activity 3.3.1.a accomplished in this quarter which costs Euro 518. Activity 3.3.1.c planed in Q2, done in Q1 2022 which costs Euro 1877. So, expenditure is high;
Since schools were closed for long time due to the COVID pandemic, these events were not accomplished;

There was lockdown due to COVID until 11th August, partners agreement was signed in July and funds received on 14 August. Partners had one and half months to implement the project. which caused low achievement.;
